meta.title: MAKO — Markdown Agent Knowledge Optimization
meta.description: Open protocol for serving LLM-optimized web content. 93% fewer tokens than HTML. Semantic structure for AI agents with CEF embeddings, actions, and smart linking.

hero.subtitle: MAKO is an open protocol that transforms web content into LLM-optimized Markdown. Semantic frontmatter, compact embeddings, and declared actions — so AI agents read the web efficiently.

how_it_works.title: How It Works
how_it_works.subtitle: Three-step content negotiation that's fully backwards-compatible with existing HTTP infrastructure.
how_it_works.step1_desc: The agent sends a HEAD request with the MAKO Accept header. The server responds with X-Mako-* headers including token count, content type, and the CEF embedding.
how_it_works.step2_desc: The agent decodes the compact CEF embedding from the header (only ~470 bytes) and checks cosine similarity against the user's query. No need to download the full content yet.
how_it_works.step2_code:
X-Mako-Embedding: gAAAA...(470 bytes)
X-Mako-Tokens: 276
X-Mako-Type: product
how_it_works.step3_desc: If relevant, the agent fetches the full MAKO document — structured Markdown with frontmatter, actions, and semantic links. Just 276 tokens instead of 4,125 from raw HTML.

benchmark.title: Token Efficiency
benchmark.subtitle: Real-world comparison of the same product page across different formats.

preview.title: What a MAKO File Looks Like
preview.subtitle: Structured YAML frontmatter + optimized Markdown body. Everything an AI agent needs, nothing it doesn't.

features.title: Built for the Agent Web
features.subtitle: Every feature designed to make AI agents read the web faster and smarter.

cef.title: Compact Embedding Format
cef.description: 512-dimension embeddings compressed to ~470 bytes via int8 quantization + gzip + base64url. Transmitted in a single HTTP header.

actions.title: Declared Actions
actions.description: Machine-readable actions (add_to_cart, subscribe, book) with endpoints and parameters. Agents know what they can do before reading the content.

links.title: Semantic Links
links.description: Internal, external, and API links with context descriptions. Agents navigate your site with purpose, not by crawling blindly.

types.title: Content Types
types.description: 10 built-in types (product, article, docs, recipe, FAQ...) plus custom. Each type tells the agent exactly what structure to expect.

ecosystem.title: The Ecosystem
ecosystem.subtitle: Everything you need to start serving MAKO content today.
ecosystem.spec_desc: The full protocol specification. Content types, frontmatter schema, HTTP headers, conformance levels, and the CEF standard.
ecosystem.js_desc: TypeScript library for parsing, generating, and validating MAKO files. Includes CEF encode/decode and Express middleware.
ecosystem.cli_desc: Command-line tool for validating, inspecting, and benchmarking MAKO files.
ecosystem.wp_desc: WordPress plugin that generates and serves MAKO content via content negotiation. WooCommerce, AI BYOK, and bulk generation.

cta.title: Ready to optimize for AI?
cta.description: Start serving LLM-optimized content in minutes. Open protocol, Apache-2.0 licensed, production-ready.

analyzer.title: MAKO Analyzer
analyzer.description: Paste any URL to see how MAKO optimizes it for AI agents. Get instant token savings analysis.
analyzer.meta_description: See how MAKO reduces tokens for any web page. Paste a URL and get instant analysis.

form.public_description: Allow this analysis to appear in the public directory

errors.fetch_failed: Could not fetch this URL. Please check the URL and try again.

directory.title: Public Analyses
directory.description: Browse publicly shared MAKO analyses from the community.
directory.meta_description: Browse publicly shared MAKO analyses and see real-world token savings.

list.no_results: No public analyses yet. Be the first to share one!

score.title: MAKO Score
score.description: How AI-ready is your website? Get your score from 0 to 100 and see what to improve.
score.meta_description: Check how AI-ready your website is. Get a score from 0-100 across content structure, metadata, LLM accessibility, and agent readiness.

form.public_description: Allow this score to appear publicly and be shared

recommendations.perfect: Perfect score! Your site is fully optimized for AI agents.
recommendations.subtitle: Improvements ordered by impact. Fix these to raise your score.
